segments.text: Tell me something about yourself and your past .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was born and grew up in hebes Province . I moved to Beijing , where I started taking courses for my MBA . When I completed my degree , I was offered an opportunity working for a financial services company . I've worked there for eight years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What was the most significant project you've worked on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was assigned a project to design a 360 - degree performance system . It was a challenge for a person with a finance background . I met with the technical people and discussed the possibilities and obstacles . Based on that information , I selected a team and created a spreadsheet to manage the project . We got the project done on schedule . I was rewarded for outstanding results and was able to share the honors with the team .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What finance experience makes you qualified for this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For the past eight years , I have been working in the banking industry . I have a solid understanding of accounting concepts , an analytical mind and a strong attention to detail . I've had a lot of customer service training and experience , and I have been told that I excel in this area .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would your coworkers evaluate you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They'd say I was a handworker and a real team player .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really need more information about the job before we start to discuss salary . I'd like to postpone that decision until later .
segments.speaker: S2
